mapper.insert: INSERT INTO myweb.member(no, id, pw, name, tel) VALUES (#{no}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{tel});
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM myweb.member WHERE id = #{id};
SELECT COUNT(id, pw) FROM myweb.member WHERE id = #{id} AND pw = #{pw};
SELECT count(no and name) FROM myweb.member WHERE no = #{no} AND name = #{name};
